text:
@marcorubio @GovRonDeSantis Florida isn’t as bad as NewYork- it’s worse - because @GovRonDeSantis refuses to issue a state wide #WearAMask mandate their numbers of #COVID19 cases will exceed NY.

at least @NYGovCuomo Has the intelligence to know wearing a mask STOPS THE SPREAD
